509510.name: Holos
509510.description:
Signup for the beta waitlist at !

---

Holos is your own web-centric computing space in VR. It’s an all-in-one ecosystem designed to make you feel at home.

Every little detail in Holos' design is there to make it the most powerful and personal place in virtual reality. Whether it's the comfort of having your favorite items around, or the power of easily getting to all of your favorite content, Holos brings everything you love close to you.


Features Include:
  • Multitasking with made-for-VR web apps
  • Personalization of your space
  • The ability to import and launch your VR apps
  • Switchable environments to fit your mood
  • Cards to organize your content in a tangible way
  • A hands-on wrist menu
  • Cross-platform support with Oculus Rift and HTC Vive
  • Leap Motion Interaction Engine integration
  • A web client to manage your cards
  • Universal hand support on Leap Motion, Oculus Touch, and HTC Vive


Coming Soon
  • Card expansion into Slates and WebVR Worlds
  • Support for richer media (propriety audio and video codecs)
  • 3D UI element support for cards
  • More robust personalization options
  • Additions to the personal assistant, Arnold
